Translations.Text: Va jahudijon guftand: Nasronijon ʙar hec ciz az dini haq nestand va incunin nasronijon dar haqqi jahudijon guftand. Va hol on ki onon Tavrot va Incilro mexondand. Hamcunin monandi qavli onho ʙa har jak dindor guftand: Tu ʙar hec ciz dar dini haq nesti! Pas, Alloh ruzi qijomat mijoni onho dar on ci ixtilof dorand, hukm mekunad. Va har jakero muvofiq ʙar amalas cazo xohad dod

Va nest kase zolimtar az onon, ki jod kardani nomi Allohro dar mascidho az ʙarpo dostani namoz va tilovati Qur'on va monandi on man' mekunand va dar vajronii onho mekusand. In guruh zolimonro sazovor ast, ki harosonu tarson ʙa mascidho darojand. Onhoro dar dunjo xori va dar oxirat azoʙi ʙuzurgest

Masriqu Maƣriʙ va moʙajni on az oni Alloh ast. U podsohi hamai zamin ast. Pas ʙar har coe, ki ru ored (dar namoz) hamon co ru ʙa Alloh ast. Sumo az mulk va to'ati U ʙerun nested. Ba durusti, ki Alloh faroxne'matu donost
Jahudijon, nasronijon va musrikon guftand, ki Alloh ʙaroi xud farzande girift. Pok ast U! Balki har ci dar osmonho va zamin ast, az oni Ust va hama farmonʙardori Ujand
Alloh ta'olo ofarinandai osmonho va zamin ast. Cun irodai cize kunad, megujad: «Mavcud sav!» Va on ciz mavcud mesavad

Nodononi axli kitoʙ va ƣajri onho (az rui kiʙrason ʙa Pajomʙari Alloh sallallohu alajhi va sallam) guftand: «Caro Alloh ʙo mo suxan namegujad, ki tu haqiqatan firistodai U hasti? Jo mu'cizae ʙar mo nameojad, ki ʙar sidqi pajomʙarii tu dalolat kunad?» Kasone, ki pes az onho ʙudand, niz sarkasona cunin suxanone meguftand. Ba saʙaʙe, ki dilhojason hamonandi jakdigar ast. Hamono Mo ʙaroi guruhe, ki ʙa Alloh imoni haqiqi ki dorand, nisonahoe ʙajon kardaem

Mo turo ʙa dini haq, ki asosi on ʙar Qur'onu Sunnat ast, ʙa pajomʙari firistodem, to muƶda dihi ʙa mardum xajri dunjovu oxiratro va ʙitarsoni sarkasonro az azoʙi Alloh. Tu mas'ul nesti ʙa onon, ki ʙa tu kufr ovardaand. Pas alʙatta onon ruzi qijomat doxili duzax savand va az on ʙerun naojand
